entry.title: WIND WARNING IN EFFECT, Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:00 AM EDT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 this morning. High plus 1. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
